technical_capabilities.name: Building, customizing, tuning & testing of AI Models
technical_capabilities.description: Innovate with top GenAI models as well as utilize the latest technology to ensure a scalable and adaptable solution that meets customers’ business needs.

technical_capabilities.description: Design, develop, test, deploy and publish Azure AI Platform-built tooling solutions intended to help developer/customers customize, tune & test AI models.

technical_capabilities.name: Build AI Apps
technical_capabilities.description: Design, develop, test, and deploy Azure AI Platform-built software solutions using Azure OpenAI, Azure AI Services, or via Azure AI Studio.

technical_capabilities.name: Cloud Scale Analytics
technical_capabilities.description: Deliver unparalleled performance in analytics at incredible value, using Azure Analytics.

technical_capabilities.name: Enable Unified Data Governance
technical_capabilities.description: Comprehensive solutions to help govern, protect, and manage your data estate.

technical_capabilities.description: Services that implement Power BI and drive a data culture with modern analytics solutions.

technical_capabilities.name: Appliance Migration to Azure Synapse
technical_capabilities.description: Migrate on-premises legacy analytics appliance to an enterprise scale data warehouse on Azure.

technical_capabilities.name: Cloud Scale Analytics
technical_capabilities.description: Drive and accelerate adoption of Fabric for ESG workloads through Fabric, Sustainability data solutions in Fabric (SDSF) and/or Microsoft Cloud for Sustainability (MC4S).

technical_capabilities.description: Build AI-powered apps with a portfolio of Azure Application Platform, Database and AI services.

technical_capabilities.description: Accelerate the software development and release process with better quality and more controlled timing using DevOps practices and GitHub products.

technical_capabilities.name: Modernize Apps
technical_capabilities.description: Modernize existing enterprise applications to Azure Application Platform, leveraging Azure Migrate and other tools.

technical_capabilities.description: Integrate enterprise applications with Azure integration services, including Azure API Management and Logic Apps.

technical_capabilities.name: Migrate and Secure Windows Server, SQL Server, and Linux Estate
technical_capabilities.description: Migrate legacy on-premises windows servers and SQL servers to Azure virtual machines.

technical_capabilities.name: Innovate with High Performance Compute
technical_capabilities.description: Support High Performance Compute workloads, typically consuming considerable amounts of computing power.

technical_capabilities.name: Innovate with AI in Low Code
technical_capabilities.description: Services to help customers build apps to modernize and innovate faster, addressing challenges across any part of the business.

technical_capabilities.name: Accelerate Revenue Generation
